propAction: The action to display. It renders after the message, at the end of the alert.
propClasses: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.
propCloseText:
Override the default label for the *close popup* icon button.

For localization purposes, you can use the provided [translations](/guides/localization/).
propColor: The main color for the alert. Unless provided, the value is taken from the `severity` prop.
propIcon:
Override the icon displayed before the children.
Unless provided, the icon is mapped to the value of the `severity` prop.
propIconMapping:
The component maps the `severity` prop to a range of different icons,
for instance success to `<SuccessOutlined>`.
If you wish to change this mapping, you can provide your own.
Alternatively, you can use the `icon` prop to override the icon displayed.
propOnClose:
Callback fired when the component requests to be closed.
When provided and no `action` prop is set, a close icon button is displayed that triggers the callback when clicked.
propRole: The ARIA role attribute of the element.
propSeverity: The severity of the alert. This defines the color and icon used.
stylesRoot: Styles applied to the root element.
stylesFilled: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="filled"`.
stylesOutlined: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="outlined"`.
stylesStandard: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="standard"`.
stylesStandardSuccess: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="standard"` and `color="success"`.
stylesStandardInfo: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="standard"` and `color="info"`.
stylesStandardWarning: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="standard"` and `color="warning"`.
stylesStandardError: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="standard"` and `color="error"`.
stylesOutlinedSuccess: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="outlined"` and `color="success"`.
stylesOutlinedInfo: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="outlined"` and `color="info"`.
stylesOutlinedWarning: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="outlined"` and `color="warning"`.
stylesOutlinedError: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="outlined"` and `color="error"`.
stylesFilledSuccess: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="filled"` and `color="success"`.
stylesFilledInfo: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="filled"` and `color="info"`.
stylesFilledWarning: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="filled"` and `color="warning"`.
stylesFilledError: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="filled"` and `color="error"`.
stylesIcon: Styles applied to the icon wrapper element.
stylesMessage: Styles applied to the message wrapper element.
stylesAction: Styles applied to the action wrapper element if `action` is provided.
